name: Kaiju People Eater
description:
this is the rough completion at the conclusion of #BGSjam11.  The game is playable but contains plenty of issues.  I believe at this point I will continue to develop this further as I learned a great deal with manipulating the AI.  this has been a tremendous learning experience for me and is something I will continue to participate in.

Kaiju People Eater is a first person shooter based on a monster that is terrorizing the city.  As the Kaiju devours the population he grows in size,  The player must use the weapons on hand to deal damage and shrink him down to a size that he can be killed.  Can you cu the Kaiju down to size before he reaches the size of adult and become unstoppable.  (The Kaiju can be defeated, but the shrinking from damage is not implemented at this point.)  If playing in full screen mode, you will need to access the task manger to kill the game.
